DESCRIPTION: Minimum space from Poly2 resistor to COMP
Minimum space from Poly2 resistor to unrelated Poly2
Minimum Plus implant overlap of Poly2 resistor
Minimum salicide block overlap of Poly2 resistor in width direction
Space from salicide block to contact on Poly2 resistor
Maximum current density of Poly2 resistor (mA/um)

Pplus Poly2 resistor shall be covered by RES_MK marking. RES_MK

length shall be coincide with resistor length (Defined by SAB length)

and width covering the width of Poly2.

both side (X and Y) are greater than 80um. then the minimum spacing to
